overview:
Mike Rowan is a Co-Founder of Atlanta-based FiPath (www.FiPath.com), formerly eRollover, the only integrated online community of consumers and advisors that provides unbiased financial resources.

FiPath is comprehensive, independent, and unbiased. Through the power of choice, members find everything they need to make better, more informed decisions to take control of their financial future. Information is packaged in a digestible format so that all type of consumers â€“ from the do it yourselfer, to those who prefer guidance along the way â€“ can make better, more informed decisions.

An experienced investment counselor, insurance executive, and financial services advisor, Mike began his career at UBS, with responsibility for implementing asset, retirement, and investment strategies. Following UBS, he worked for National Insurance Brokerage (NIB), an insurance marketing firm located in Atlanta.

After NIB, Mike founded eInsurance Advisors, an insurance and investment marketing firm catering to over 10,000 advisors nationwide. Currently licensed in over 25 states, they represent over 50 of the top life insurance, annuity, long term care, and disability carriers in the United States.

Mike has served as the President of the Young Advisors Committee for the State of Georgia. He serves on the Board of the Georgia Chapter of the National Association of Insurance and Financial Advisors (NAIFA), and is also an area-vice president, speaking before, and educating insurance and financial advisors across the state.

Mike has been published by and contributes to a variety of websites and publications such as NASDAQ, Business Week, Daily Finance, eHow, WikiInvest, and Examiner.com.

Mike received a BBA from the University of Georgia with an emphasis in Risk Management and Finance. He’s a native of Dallas, TX.
